mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS MEMBERTOTAL, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE ENROLL_DATE = SYSDATE)AS TOTAYJOINER, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NARUMARU) AS MARUCOUNT, (SELECT SUM(AMOUNT) FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAYDAY = SYSDATE) AS TODAYAMOUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DECLARATION WHERE POL_DATE = SYSDATE ) AS TODAYDECLATION FROM MEMBER GROUP BY 2;
